title: Griff's Canadian Adventure
overview: Welsh comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones embarks on a journey across the second largest Country on the planet; Canada. Through mountains, prairies, ice and forest, travelling from East to West, Griff will explore how it's history has shaped the Canada of today and uncover what makes each province so tantalizingly unique, yet distinctly Canadian. From the rugged Atlantic Coast of Newfoundland to Vancouver in the Pacific Northwest, each episode will see Griff undergo a challenge to truly experience each province, with a little help from locals and experts he meets along the way
